## Main reference

## What you will learn this week

* What makes R different from other programming languages
* Differences between RStudio and Positron
* Integration of GitHub and version control in R IDEs
* Integration of AI tools in R IDEs
* Sources of R packages: CRAN, Bioconductor, GitHub
* Scalars and vectors
* Lists and data frames

## Pre-class activities

  * Install [Positron](https://positron.posit.co/download.html)
  * Work through the [quick tour](https://posit.co/blog/a-quick-tour-of-positron/)
  * Watch "From RStudio to Positron": [video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tvm4bJf1xzI)
  * Watch "Exploratory data analysis with R in Positron": [video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ndq2Mm3Dju8)
